page.title: 09Riding and Hunting.
page.content: There are a lot of people in the Domesday block that ride. There are lots of things to do on ponies around the place.There are one-day-events and pony club things in Lockington. My sister and I go hunting a lot and we go on long rides to keep the ponies fit between Saturdays when we go hunting.In summer when hunting has finished there are a lot of shows and gymkhanas that I go to on my show jumper and I have a hunter to go hunting on. The hunt is called the Holderness Hunt and the hounds and hunt hores live in Etton.In the hunting season there is a meet every Saturday and Tuesday if the weather is suiable. About fifty people attend each meet.
